title: Defective Battlesuit

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You'll visit a random player each night, and you'll be informed about who you're targeting. Each night, you may choose to either deal them a Powerful attack, protect them with Powerful defense, or roleblock them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You'll protect yourself with Basic defense the first time you're attacked, and deal a Powerful attack to whoever attacked you. After this is activated, you'll be able to choose your targets at night instead of targeting them randomly.

*You don't have anything to worry about, sir. It works. Trust me.*
